Audit Report.Bug ID: Input signal s is not constrained in eff_ecdsa.circom

Input signal s is not constrained in eff.Short Description of the Vulnerability: The circuit computes `pubKey = s * T + U` but `s` isn't constrained. If we set `s = 0` and `(Ux, Uy) = pubKey`, then `(Tx, Ty)` can be any pair of values.
Input signal s is not constrained in eff.Short Description of the Exploit: Set `s = 0` and rest of the inputs can be any number.
Input signal s is not constrained in eff.Proposed Mitigation: Add constraint to `s` so that `s * T` can't be skipped in the computation.
